channel.title: Academic on Nicolas G-Godbout
channel.description: Recent content in Academic on Nicolas G-Godbout

item.title: Video *games* and complexity
item.description: A fun math undergraruatelevel talk which uses classic Nintendo game levels as a mean to introduce the fundamental questions and concepts of the theory of computational complexity.

item.title: Adaptive Markov Chain Monte Carlo : an introduction for the average mathematician
item.description: An introductory talk on MCMC methods, aimed at graduate mathematics or statistics students (or really anybody who happens to have some basic knowledge in stochastic processes).

item.title: Challenger : the dangers of biased information
